scripts.eas:mobile: cd apps/mobile && EAS_CLI_VERSION=16.28.0 pnpm dlx eas-cli@$EAS_CLI_VERSION
scripts.eas:mobile:version: cd apps/mobile && EAS_CLI_VERSION=16.28.0 pnpm dlx eas-cli@$EAS_CLI_VERSION --version
scripts.eas:mobile:config:ios: cd apps/mobile && EAS_CLI_VERSION=16.28.0 pnpm dlx eas-cli@$EAS_CLI_VERSION config -p ios
scripts.eas:mobile:build:android:local:dev: cd apps/mobile && EAS_CLI_VERSION=16.28.0 pnpm dlx eas-cli@$EAS_CLI_VERSION build -p android --profile development --local
scripts.eas:mobile:build:android:cloud:dev: cd apps/mobile && EAS_CLI_VERSION=16.28.0 pnpm dlx eas-cli@$EAS_CLI_VERSION build -p android --profile development
scripts.eas:mobile:build:android:cloud:preview: bash ./scripts/eas-guard.sh preview && cd apps/mobile && EAS_CLI_VERSION=16.28.0 pnpm dlx eas-cli@$EAS_CLI_VERSION build -p android --profile preview
scripts.eas:mobile:build:ios:cloud:preview: bash ./scripts/eas-guard.sh preview && cd apps/mobile && EAS_CLI_VERSION=16.28.0 pnpm dlx eas-cli@$EAS_CLI_VERSION build -p ios --profile preview
scripts.eas:mobile:build:android:cloud:productio: bash ./scripts/eas-guard.sh production && cd apps/mobile && EAS_CLI_VERSION=16.28.0 pnpm dlx eas-cli@$EAS_CLI_VERSION build -p android --profile production
scripts.eas:mobile:build:ios:cloud:production: bash ./scripts/eas-guard.sh production && cd apps/mobile && EAS_CLI_VERSION=16.28.0 pnpm dlx eas-cli@$EAS_CLI_VERSION build -p ios --profile production
scripts.eas:mobile:build:ios:dev: cd apps/mobile && EAS_CLI_VERSION=16.28.0 pnpm dlx eas-cli@$EAS_CLI_VERSION build -p ios --profile development --clear-cache
